$\begin{align}
\blue{4+1}&\blue{=2+2}\\
\blue{5}&\blue{=4}\\
\end{align}$  
This is not true because $5$ is not the same as $4$.

$\begin{align}
\purple{4+2}&\purple{=7+1}\\
\purple{6}&\purple{=8}\\
\end{align}$  
This is not true because $6$ is not the same as $8$.

$\begin{align}
\pink{1+1}&\pink{=4-2}\\
\pink{2}&\pink{=2}\\
\end{align}$  
This is true because $2$ is the same as $2$.
